title: How to Do Fun Google Tricks and Easter Eggs

steps.title: Type in the key words "Zerg rush".
steps.content: Type in the key words "Zerg rush". The capitalization is irrelevant.

steps.title: The Google O's will fall.
steps.content: The Google O's will fall. Plus, they will appear to be eating away at the entire page.

steps.title: Click away.
steps.content: Click away. Your goal is to click on them and get rid of them.

steps.title: Go to the real Google page.
steps.content: Go to the real Google page.

steps.title: Click the "I'm feeling lucky" button.
steps.content: Click the "I'm feeling lucky" button. It will send you to a site named Mr.doob.com. You can type things in the search bar and they will fall out the top of the page!

steps.title: Check out the Google Pacman game.
steps.content: Check out the Google Pacman game. Go to regular Google. Type in "Google Pacman". Hit "I'm feeling lucky".

steps.title: Google Rainbow!
steps.content: Google Rainbow! You can now search under the rainbow.

steps.title: Open up the hyperlink saying "Google Space - Mr.doob".
steps.content: Open up the hyperlink saying "Google Space - Mr.doob".

steps.title: Have fun as everything floats around!
steps.content: Have fun as everything floats around! Do not press "images", "maps", etc. It will open regular Google!

steps.title: Type in 'Do a Barrel Roll' (capitalization not needed).
steps.content: Type in 'Do a Barrel Roll' (capitalization not needed).

steps.title: Hit enter.
steps.content: Hit enter. The screen should roll around in a circle.

steps.title: Go to images and a game will appear.
steps.content: Go to images and a game will appear.

steps.title: Have Epic Google, where the Google Logo, with Epic above it, gets bigger and bigger.
steps.content: Have Epic Google, where the Google Logo, with Epic above it, gets bigger and bigger.

steps.title: Be at the website, where the Google Logo, with Weenie above it, gets smaller and smaller.
steps.content: Be at the website, where the Google Logo, with Weenie above it, gets smaller and smaller.
